description:
Ran is not your typical Gal. But what is a Gal? And what are “ironclad rules of being a Gal?” Ran Kotobuki will teach you! Join Ran as she helps spread world peace, all while being a Gal!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenka no Gal Ikeike: Kotobuki Ran
The World`s Greatest Gal Go, Go Ran Kotobuki!
天下のギャル♥イケイケ→寿蘭
